recipe.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipe.method: Boil the spagetti in water. Cook some minced meat in a fry pan. Mix the minced meat around. Add the veggies and tomato paste into the fry pan. Give it a mix. Follow the pasta's instructions and after it is cooked, strain. Add the pasta to a serving bowl, put a scoop of the bolognese sauce on top of the pasta. Add a few basil leaves on top, optional cheese. Done :)
